Description: Cornelian leg and foot amulet, pierced for suspension.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.71 J.H. Taylor & D. Antoine, Ancient lives, new discoveries, London 2014, p. 110.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 13 Oct-1998 5 Jan, India, New Delhi, National Museum, The Enduring Image 1998 9 Feb-3 May, India, Mumbai, Sir Caswasjee Jahangir Hall, The Enduring Image 2014-15 22 May to 19 April, London, British Museum, 'Ancient Lives, New Discoveries'
